meanings.definition: Of or relating to a material exhibiting antiferromagnetism.
meanings.sent1: The antiferromagnetic properties of the material made it repel other magnets.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the antiferromagnetic behavior of the substance under different conditions.
meanings.sent3: The antiferromagnetic material was so stubborn, it refused to stick to any magnet!
meanings.sent4: Her personality was like an antiferromagnetic force, always pushing others away.
meanings.sent5: The antiferromagnetic nature of the rock was as mysterious as the moon's pull on the tides.

meanings.sent1: The researchers discovered a new antiferromagnetic in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The antiferromagnetic was carefully analyzed to understand its magnetic properties.
meanings.sent3: The little antiferromagnetic sat quietly among the other magnets, feeling different.
meanings.sent4: In the world of magnets, the antiferromagnetic was the unsung hero.
meanings.sent5: The rare antiferromagnetic was a treasure in the collection of magnetic materials.
